name: Husky's Adventures
description:
Husky's Adentures, 3D Platformer Game,
Each level has its own atmosphere!

Complete Cute Designed Levels!


Controls;
WASD - Movement
Q - Dash (Special Ability)
Space - Jump
ESC - Menu

Joystick - Movement
Trigger Buttons(Left or Right) - Dash
South Button - Jump
Settings - Menu
